title: Competency-Enhancement Program for Medication Calculation Skills for Nursing Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic pharmaceutical terminology and possession of simple calculation skills
context.additional_context: Need for practical-centered learning to perform the role of medical field managers.

learning_goals: Learners can calculate adult patient weight-based medication doses with over 85% accuracy
Learners can convert injection administration rates to mL/hr units with 90% accuracy
Learners can explain the step-by-step process for solving multi-step medication calculation problems of at least four stages

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
